favourite.article: This is faith. We are not but God is. We just want to love Him, see Him, and even become Him in life, nature, and expression. We want nothing but Him alone. O the joy of having nothing, being nothing, and seeing nothing but a living Christ in glory. Hallelujah~~~Amen!!
Very nice song .... I really love it ..... ♡♡♡
Loving this song; touch my heart. Thanks, brother Luke.
I really love this song, very touching.

For the Kingdom Christ is Building...is Here on Earth before our Eyes...
Matthew 16:18 And I also say to you that you are Peter, and upon this rock I will build My Church, and the gates of Hades shall not prevail against it.
Yeah, we only have the Living Christ in glory! Wow! So wonderful! We are having nothing, being nothing and seeing nothing! This is what I want to say in my inner part now. Praise the Lord! Amen.
The joy of having nothing but Christ is a great gain for us who live and love Christ rather than the things in the world.
This song is my favourite song. The Lord will overcome this world and He will rule!!!!!!
There's nothing can be joyful than being with the Lord. There's nothing more important than the Lord. There's nothing can satisfy human except the Lord!

"For we did not determine to know anything among you except Christ, and this One crucified." How we really need to look to the Lord, to see only this living Christ in glory, that we may be completely given for His interest on earth, which is simply Christ living in every believer for His expression, and Christ as our life, light and love.
ONLY CHRIST IS OUR GAIN. It is a real joy to be, see, have nothing but the Living Christ is all in all. He filled up every gap. What else could we desire for? Nothing but HIM alone. AMEN!
AMEN, He is everything. no longer I, but Christ who lives in me.

Praise the Lord! We are nothing, but He is everything; we do nothing, and He does everything; we become nothing so that He becomes everything, our all-inclusive replacement. God's complete salvation is just the Triune God Himself! May we hear him and see Jesus only.

I like this song because people who have everything think its the best thing in the world. But really we don't have anything. All we have is the Lord's Word. It told me that we really don't have anything. I am glad that Jesus Christ died for us. May God Bless you and keep you in all that you do.

O the joy of having nothing... O the joy of being nothing... O the joy of seeing nothing... The joy, the joy, the joy!!! Oh Lord Jesus...I only want You, my joy, and Your interest here on earth.....Amen, Amen, Amen!

Recently I read a biography of John Nelson Darby. On the first page he says, "O the joy of having nothing and being nothing, seeing nothing but a living Christ in glory, and being careful for nothing but His interests down here." This was a word spoken in his old age, in which he longed to be nothing, to have nothing, and to care for nothing but to have only Christ and care only for His interests on earth. What a joy this is! Hence, "Be not and He will be; / Wait and He'll all things give." Through the generations there were saints who experienced this. Today we should have this experience even more.
Source: The Governing and Controlling Vision in the Bible, chapter 4.
